short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful extension for musicians who want to play to Youtube videos (e.g. Drumless).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features: 

  * Change the playback rate in steps of one percent
  * Set bookmarks at arbitrary points


Keyboard shortcuts:

  * b = set bookmark
  * y = jump to previous bookmark
  * x = jump to next bookmark
  * del = remove bookmark of currently played bookmarked section
